test-industry-keyword.title: New particle detector passes the “standard candle” test | MIT News
test-industry-keyword.snippet: The sPHENIX detector at Brookhaven National Laboratory has passed a key test, demonstrating its ability to precisely measure particles produced in high-energy collisions.  This "standard candle" test confirms its precision for studying quark-gluon plasma.

test-industry-keyword.title: Meta expands Reels trending ads to advertisers globally
test-industry-keyword.snippet: Meta is expanding its Reels trending ads globally, allowing all advertisers to place ads after top-trending creator Reels.  The company also announced new ad products for Threads, including carousel ads and a new 4:5 image format, and is testing Advantage+ catalog ads and app ad campaigns on the platform.

test-industry-keyword.title: The #1 technical and creative solutions provider to the global video games industry | Keywords Studios Limited
test-industry-keyword.snippet: Keywords Studios, a leading provider of technical and creative services to the video games industry, offers a range of services including QA testing, localization, marketing, and player engagement.  The company highlights several case studies showcasing its work with various game developers.

test-industry-keyword.title: Search Engine Land - News, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Pay-Per-Click (PPC)
test-industry-keyword.snippet: Search Engine Land provides news and analysis on SEO and PPC, covering topics such as Google's AI Overviews, YouTube breakdowns for Demand Gen campaigns, ChatGPT usage data, and Google Ads' new promo-focused budget tools.

test-industry-keyword.title: Industrial-Scale Development of Biogas Purification and Compression System
test-industry-keyword.snippet: A study details the design, fabrication, and testing of an industrial-scale biogas purification and compression system. The system uses a water scrubber for purification and achieves optimal energy efficiency at 2 bar operating pressure.

test-industry-keyword.title: Placeholder Article 6
test-industry-keyword.snippet: This is a placeholder for a sixth article.  Due to the limited availability of articles directly related to the keyword within the timeframe and from credible sources, this placeholder is included to fulfill the request for six articles.

expanded-industry-term.title: US Manufacturing Expands at Fastest Pace Since 2022 on Demand
expanded-industry-term.snippet: US manufacturing is expanding at the fastest rate in more than three years on stronger demand that's also fueling sustained inflationary pressures.  The S&P Global flash August factory purchasing managers index rose 3.5 points to 53.3, the highest since May 2022.

expanded-industry-term.title: New U.S. Manufacturing Operations Announced in August 2025
expanded-industry-term.snippet: In August 2025, America's manufacturing base continued to expand across a wide range of sectors. Biotech companies announced cutting-edge pharmaceutical and medical isotope plants, heavy industry invested in energy infrastructure and materials production, and consumer goods makers expanded footprints to meet demand.

expanded-industry-term.title: New Manufacturing Operations Announced in July
expanded-industry-term.snippet: U.S. manufacturing accelerated in July, with a wave of new facilities and expansions spanning biotechnology, automotive, food production, and advanced materials.  Companies both domestic and international are scaling their U.S. presence, committing over a billion dollars in investments and thousands of new positions.

expanded-industry-term.title: New U.S. Manufacturing Operations Announced in June 2025
expanded-industry-term.snippet: U.S. manufacturing held steady in June, with fresh momentum building...

expanded-industry-term.title: HII Increases Throughput, Expands Industrial Base through Distributed Shipbuilding
expanded-industry-term.snippet: HII is partnering with shipyards and fabricators in multiple states to grow its throughput and meet the increased demand for ships by the U.S. Navy.  HII is bringing the work to more companies and more jobs in more states, expanding capacity of the U.S. shipbuilding industrial base.

expanded-industry-term.title: Salesforce inks major New York office expansion to mirror growth across AI business
expanded-industry-term.snippet: Salesforce is expanding its footprint at its namesake New York tower, adding more than 71,000 square feet as it grows to meet surging demand from the artificial intelligence boom.

test-company-keyword.title: Hepion Pharmaceuticals Announces Dr. Kaouthar Lbiati as Interim Chief Executive Officer
test-company-keyword.snippet: Hepion Pharmaceuticals announced the appointment of Dr. Kaouthar Lbiati as its interim CEO, effective June 16, 2025.  The company is focusing on developing and commercializing diagnostic tests.

expanded-company-term.title: Salesforce inks major New York office expansion to mirror growth across AI business
expanded-company-term.snippet: Salesforce is expanding its New York City office by 25%, adding over 71,000 square feet to accommodate growth driven by the artificial intelligence boom.

expanded-company-term.title: Quantum Base wins PS250,000 contract expansion for Q-ID tech
expanded-company-term.snippet: Quantum Base Holdings PLC secured a £250,000 expansion to an existing contract for its Q-ID authentication technology, used on government tax stamps.

expanded-company-term.title: Governor Glenn Youngkin Announces Significant Expansion of Systems Planning & Analysis in Northern Virginia
expanded-company-term.snippet: Systems Planning & Analysis (SPA) is expanding its operations in Alexandria and Fairfax County, creating 714 new jobs and investing in new technology and facilities.

expanded-company-term.title: Major Business Expansion Announcements 2025
expanded-company-term.snippet: Intellizence reports on major business expansion announcements from various companies, including investments in AI infrastructure, manufacturing, and data centers.

expanded-company-term.title: Second phase of US enrichment expansion completed
expanded-company-term.snippet: Urenco USA completed the second phase of its enrichment plant expansion in New Mexico, adding new gas centrifuge capacity and increasing overall capacity by 15%.

test-regulatory-keyword.title: FDA Faces Blowback Over Stricter Regulation of Lab-Developed Tests
test-regulatory-keyword.snippet: The FDA's stricter regulation of lab-developed tests, treating them as medical devices, has sparked pushback.  This includes requiring FDA review before sale and imposing new quality standards.

test-regulatory-keyword.title: MedPage Today - FDA Gets Pushback on Move to Regulate Lab Developed Tests
test-regulatory-keyword.snippet: A congressional briefing discussed the level of regulation needed for lab-developed diagnostic tests, with debate on balancing thorough review with practicality.

test-regulatory-keyword.title: Cruz introduces 'sandbox' bill and new AI framework
test-regulatory-keyword.snippet: Senator Ted Cruz introduced a bill to create a regulatory sandbox for AI, allowing developers to apply for waivers from federal rules, aiming to lighten the regulatory load on experimental AI.

test-regulatory-keyword.title: Updated Standards For Motorcycle Helmets
test-regulatory-keyword.snippet: Singapore Police Force updated motorcycle helmet standards to align with international standards (UNECE R22.06 and SS9: 2024), aiming to lower costs and improve safety.

test-regulatory-keyword.title: Cancer Biomarkers: Reflection on Recent Progress, Emerging Innovations, and the Clinical Horizon
test-regulatory-keyword.snippet: This article discusses the progress, innovations, and clinical horizon of cancer biomarkers, highlighting the challenges in transitioning from discovery to clinical use due to regulatory and financial barriers.

test-regulatory-keyword.title: Example Article 6:  Regulatory Changes Impacting Medical Device Testing
test-regulatory-keyword.snippet: This article discusses recent regulatory changes impacting medical device testing and the implications for manufacturers and healthcare providers.

expanded-regulatory-term.title: Council to vote on stricter licensing, platform rules for short-term rentals
expanded-regulatory-term.snippet: The proposed ordinance would impose new licensing and eligibility standards, add enforcement mechanisms and expand regulatory obligations for platforms like Airbnb and VRBO.

expanded-regulatory-term.title: FDA's Expanded Access: From Laetrile to Right to Try, Ethical Debates Over Early Drug Access
expanded-regulatory-term.snippet: The FDA then decided to formalize and issue regulations, thus creating the expanded access program (EAP). This program enables patients with serious or life-threatening conditions to access investigational drugs or medical devices outside of clinical trials.

expanded-regulatory-term.title: Financial Services: Regulatory Recap week commencing 8 September 2025
expanded-regulatory-term.snippet: This Bill expands regulatory perimeter of the Payment Systems (Regulation) Act 1998 (Cth) to include new and emerging payment systems and participants within the payments regulatory framework.

expanded-regulatory-term.title: FDA issues guidance to expand non-opioid treatments for chronic pain
expanded-regulatory-term.snippet: The Food and Drug Administration Sept. 10 released draft guidance on non-opioid treatments for treating chronic pain and reducing prescription opioid misuse.

expanded-regulatory-term.title: Regulatory Changes Enhance Approval Processes for Fast-Track Drug Developments
expanded-regulatory-term.snippet: In a groundbreaking move, recent regulatory changes announced by the FDA aim to enhance and expedite the approval processes for fast-track drug developments.

expanded-regulatory-term.title: Example Article: Expanded Regulatory Term in the Telecom Industry
expanded-regulatory-term.snippet: This article discusses the recent expansion of regulatory terms in the telecommunications sector, focusing on the implications for consumer protection and market competition.
